name: Translation and Interpretation Services for Families
description: SFUSD is committed to providing quality and professional translation (written) and interpretation (oral) services to all families.
fullDescription: SFUSD is committed to providing quality and professional translation (written) and interpretation (oral) services to all families.
whatTheyOffer: SFUSD is committed to providing quality and professional translation (written) and interpretation (oral) services to all families.
howToGetIt: If you are a parent/guardian of a SFUSD student and would like to request translation (written) and/or interpretation (oral) services, please review the following FAQs and contact the teachers or administrators at your child's school. Go here to review FAQs and procedure for submitting a request: https://www.sfusd.edu/services/family-supports-services/family-school-communications/translation-and-interpretation-services-families
